Home.description: I work as a freelance engineer in both Canada and Japan.

Projects.title: Vancouver RoomFinder
Projects.description: Iâ€™m excited to share that I have built a website that introduces shared housing in Canada! From requirement gathering to final implementation, I handled every step of this project. The website provides easy navigation and valuable information for people looking for shared accommodations in Canada.

Projects.title: Japanese-English Phrase Learning App
Projects.description: An app that leverages AI to revolutionize the efficiency of English learning. It incorporates real needs I experienced during my study abroad, such as features I wished existed to make learning easier. Designed to address challenges faced by language learners, it prioritizes intuitive mobile usability and delivers a seamless user experience.

Projects.title: Social Media Clone
Projects.description: This project aims to create a unique social media platform by integrating essential features from modern social networking sites and major services. I started with basic functionalities such as authentication and user posts. Although the project is still in progress, I plan to expand its features and enhance its usability in the future.

About.title: About me
About.description: I have full-stack development experience, focusing on React, Next.js, and Node.js, utilizing the latest technologies. I studied algorithms, HTML, JavaScript, and SQL at Cornerstone International Community College in Canada and gained hands-on experience in application development. I value UI/UX design and teamwork, and I aim to continue enhancing my skills while building products that deliver meaningful value to users.

Experiences.title: My experience
Experiences.description: I have contributed to driving projects forward by utilizing my experience in working with multicultural teams, respecting diverse cultures and individual personalities.

Educations.title: Education
Educations.description: Through my experience, I have worked with the following technology stack. I possess a wide range of skills, covering both frontend and backend development. I can design and build flexible systems tailored to specific requirements. From creating dynamic UIs using React and Next.js to managing data efficiently with SQL and NoSQL databases, and developing backend services with Node.js and Express, I am capable of delivering end-to-end solutions.

Skills.title: My skills
Skills.description: Through my experience, I have worked with the following technology stack. I possess a wide range of skills, covering both frontend and backend development, enabling me to design and build flexible systems tailored to specific requirements. From building dynamic UIs with React and Next.js to efficiently managing data using SQL and NoSQL, and handling server-side development with Node.js and Express, I am capable of delivering end-to-end solutions.
